alert.note: Alert for Pecos; Ward (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 07 at 2:10PM CST until January 09 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST MONDAY... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MONDAY TO MIDNIGHT CST MONDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Warning, west winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Ward and Pecos Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM CST Monday. For the High Wind Warning, from 6 AM Monday to midnight CST Monday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
